name: catalytically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves the use of a catalyst (= a substance that makes a chemical reaction happen more quickly without itself being changed) : That particular rock type contains minerals that are thought to be very catalytically active. In the stratosphere, nitrous oxide catalytically destroys ozone.
More examplesFewer examplesMethanol can be catalytically broken down to carbon monoxide and hydrogen.This toxin catalytically inhibits protein synthesis.He outlined the way in which small RNA fragments act catalytically in the cell.
